peopleAlsoAsk.question: Is Ulvik worth visiting?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: Hauge. But most of all, Ulvik is an idyllic fjord village that is worth visiting all year round. Ulvik, which is the name of both the village and the municipality, is located northeast and at the innermost part of the Hardangerfjord.
